# calculadora_simples

Description. 
The package calculadora_simples is used to:
	Class_Calculadora:
		- Soma
		- Subtracao
		- Multiplicacao
		- Divisao

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install package_name

```bash
pip install calculadora_simples
```
